thread.title: Caroline Marcon
thread.title_full: Otticanet recensione scritta da Caroline Marcon

author: Caroline Marcon
title: Caroline Marcon
text:
I have purchased both designer Bvlgari sunglasses and prescription glasses! Both are 100% authentic! The service was fantastic and prompt! They were able to stick to a deadline as I was leaving overseas!
Postage was fast and efficient! Will definitely return for business and highly recommend to future customers! Thanks Ottica
